title: Puerto Ricans Are At Risk From The Coronavirus And A Lack Of Information
description: The U.S. territory of Puerto Rico has the most older Americans per capita, making their population especially vulnerable to the coronavirus. A vital tool in preventing its spread there? Timely and culturally relevant public health information in Spanish. Maddie talks with Mónica Feliú-Mójer of the group CienciaPR about their science communication efforts.

itunes:title: Puerto Ricans Are At Risk From The Coronavirus And A Lack Of Information
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Mónica Feliú-Mójer of the group CienciaPR argues that Spanish-language information about the pandemic needs to be communicated in a timely and culturally relevant way.
itunes:subtitle: Mónica Feliú-Mójer of the group CienciaPR argues that Spanish-language information about the pandemic needs to be communicated in a timely and culturally relevant way.
